===Etymology===
Literally "hair of eye". Compound of {{m|ja|目|tr=ma||eye}}, {{m|ja|つ|tr=tsu|pos=genitive case}}, and {{m|ja|毛|tr=ke||hair}}. Final -ke voices to -ge due to [[w:Rendaku|rendaku]].
